title.narrative: OUTPUT 2.A: CAPACITY STRENGTHENING & SECTORAL COORDINATION

description.narrative: Capacity of national and local institutions strengthened for improved management and delivery of Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) services, which contributes to Children In Urban Settings / Local Governance, Disaster Risk Reduction, Environmental Sustainability, Sanitation, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Adolescent girls and boys, mothers and fathers, and community leaders in 106 districts adopt 11 key life-saving, care and protective behaviours for children and women

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Capacity of national and local institutions strengthened for improved management and delivery of WASH services

description.narrative: As WASH cluster lead UNICEF continued its support to strengthen and support coordination at national and subnational level. In2020, UNICEF started co-leading the Yemen Water Sector Donors’ Group. | Status:Partially met | As-of Date:17/01/2021
